attributes.action: Disregard the Brexit referendum decision due to fraudulent campaign claims.
attributes.additional_details:
Professor Michael Dougan assesses UK’s position following vote to leave the EU:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0dosmKwrAbI
attributes.background: Campaigners made dishonest claims to support their position which invalidate the referendum result as voters relied on factually incorrect information to make their decision.
